headline: Is Realty Income Corporation One of the Best Monthly Dividend Stocks on the Market?
summary: Realty Income Corporation (NYSE:O) is one of the Best REIT Dividend Stocks to Buy in 2025. The company is widely recognized as a monthly dividend stock, distributing dividends each month. In June 2025, the company declared its 660th consecutive monthly dividend and marked its 131st dividend increase since it began trading on the NYSE three […]

headline: Realty Income Announces Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced it will release its second quarter 2025 operating results after the New York Stock Exchange closes on August 6, 2025. Following publication of this earnings release, the company will host its quarterly investor call at 2:00 p.m. PDT.

headline: Could This Be the Smartest Dividend Stock to Buy in Summer 2025?
summary: Realty Income is well off its highs, despite strong business results.  Realty Income has a high yield and could benefit as interest rates fall.  Realty Income (NYSE: O) is one of the largest real estate investment trusts, or REITs, in the market, owning more than 15,600 properties in the U.S. and Europe.
